title: Completed PE Summary - Sovereign II
raw_html:
Category Leisure
Registered Owner & Manager: Sovereign
Flag: UK
Type: Dive support boat
Gross tonnage: 0.01
Date & Time 13/08/05 11:28
Location of incident: UK Coastal Waters
Incident Type: Accident to Person
Injuries/ fatalities: Serious injury
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

While attempting to climb aboard his dive support boat from the water, a recreational diver came into contact with one of the boat's propellers. He suffered serious injuries to his legs.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has written to the British Diving Safety Group recommending that they:

  • review the instructions in the Harmonised Code that deal with sports diving,

  • provide other suitable advice to their members that will enhance the safety of sports diving.
